name: Scrapper_Melee.Katana
display_help: Wield a Katana and master a variety of powerful Lethal attacks. A quick and elegant weapon, the Katana is faster than a Broad Sword, and can reduce an enemy's Defense. The Katana is a fine blade that always has a bonus to Accuracy. Like all scrapper powers, all Katana attacks can sometimes land a critical hit for double damage.

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Katana.Hack
powers.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Katana.Parry
powers.display_help: You can use your katana to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Katana.Taunt
powers.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Katana.Head_Splitter
powers.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Katana attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
